title: Amazing deal knocks $80 off AirPods Pro 2
description: Apple's high-end, noise-canceling earbuds already provide incredible value, and this AirPods Pro 2 deal makes them even more affordable. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Rajesh Pandey
excerpt: Apple's high-end, noise-canceling earbuds already provide incredible value, and this AirPods Pro 2 deal makes them even more affordable.
text: Deals You don't want to miss this AirPods Pro 2 deal. Image: Cult of Mac A new AirPods Pro 2 deal drops the price of Apple’s excellent noise-canceling earbuds to just $169.99. The incredibly popular earbuds sound great, offer amazing capabilities — and can even function as clinical-grade hearing aids. Make no mistake: These are the best wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone, Mac and other Apple gear. Nothing can match how seamlessly AirPods integrate with Apple devices. And this deal offers a fantastic discount off the AirPods Pro 2 list price of $249. This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. AirPods Pro 2 deal: Save on earbuds that excel in every department Best earbuds for Apple gear AirPods Pro 2 wireless earbuds (USB-C) 4.5 AirPods Pro 2 are a fantastic pair of earbuds for your iPhone, delivering terrific sound quality, excellent ANC, and advanced features like Personalized Spatial Audio. Pros:Fab sound qualityExcellent ANCHearing Health features let them double as clinical-grade hearing aids and active hearing protectionUSB-C wireless charging case Cons:Hard to come up with one Apple revolutionized the earbud world when it released the original AirPods in 2016. Since then, the company revised and upgraded its earbuds, continuously adding new capabilities and features. The AirPods Pro 2 discounted in this deal sit at the top of the list. They’re Apple’s latest, greatest high-end earbuds. Their sleek, white design incorporates soft, silicone ear tips for maximum comfort and physically blocking noise. (They come with four different sizes of ear tips so you can dial in your fit.) The included MagSafe charging case charges wirelessly or via a USB-C cable. Battery life is another awesome deal when it comes to AirPods Pro 2. With active noise cancellation enabled, the earbuds can last up to six hours, with the charging case extending the runtime to 30 hours. Advanced features like hearing health and Personalized Spatial Audio The company’s fantastic H2 chip enables the AirPods Pro 2’s advanced features and provides an unmatched level of integration into the Apple ecosystem. Connect the earbuds to your iPhone, and they will automatically pair with other devices linked to your iCloud account. You can seamlessly switch between your iPhone, Mac, Apple TV, iPad and Apple Watch. Apart from the deep device integration, the AirPods Pro 2 earbuds in this deal deliver outstanding sound quality. Our own David Snow sang the praises of the earbuds in his AirPods Pro 2 review, saying they deliver “undeniably high” sound quality. From a pure sound quality point, Apple’s offering is as good or better than similar options in this price range. Plus, with the AirPods Pro 2, you get features like Personalized Spatial Audio and Adaptive Transparency mode to improve the experience. Apple continues to upgrade these earbuds via firmware updates. The company even built a state-of-the-art Audio Lab in Cupertino, California, to do pioneering work in this area. For instance, the recently added suite of Hearing Health features offer advanced tools for testing and protecting the hearing of people who wear Apple’s earbuds. If you want in on all this juicy AirPods Pro 2 action, jump on this deal before it disappears. Save on AirPods Pro 2 with this deal With a $249 MSRP, the second-gen AirPods Pro are expensive. But if you want the best sound quality and amazing battery life, there are hardly any other options available. The only real rival is Beats’ Powerbeats Pro 2 earbuds, which come with ear hooks that ensure they won’t fall off during strenuous activities like sports. This new AirPods Pro 2 deal, which knocks nearly $80 off the earbuds, is music to our ears. html:
• Deals

A new AirPods Pro 2 deal drops the price of Apple’s excellent noise-canceling earbuds to just $169.99. The incredibly popular earbuds sound great, offer amazing capabilities — and can even function as clinical-grade hearing aids.

Make no mistake: These are the best wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone, Mac and other Apple gear. Nothing can match how seamlessly AirPods integrate with Apple devices. And this deal offers a fantastic discount off the AirPods Pro 2 list price of $249.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

AirPods Pro 2 deal: Save on earbuds that excel in every department

Best earbuds for Apple gear

AirPods Pro 2 wireless earbuds (USB-C)

4.5

AirPods Pro 2 are a fantastic pair of earbuds for your iPhone, delivering terrific sound quality, excellent ANC, and advanced features like Personalized Spatial Audio.

Pros:

  • Fab sound quality
  • Excellent ANC
  • Hearing Health features let them double as clinical-grade hearing aids and active hearing protection
  • USB-C wireless charging case

Cons:

  • Hard to come up with one

Apple revolutionized the earbud world when it released the original AirPods in 2016. Since then, the company revised and upgraded its earbuds, continuously adding new capabilities and features.

The AirPods Pro 2 discounted in this deal sit at the top of the list. They’re Apple’s latest, greatest high-end earbuds. Their sleek, white design incorporates soft, silicone ear tips for maximum comfort and physically blocking noise. (They come with four different sizes of ear tips so you can dial in your fit.) The included MagSafe charging case charges wirelessly or via a USB-C cable.

Battery life is another awesome deal when it comes to AirPods Pro 2. With active noise cancellation enabled, the earbuds can last up to six hours, with the charging case extending the runtime to 30 hours.

Advanced features like hearing health and Personalized Spatial Audio

The company’s fantastic H2 chip enables the AirPods Pro 2’s advanced features and provides an unmatched level of integration into the Apple ecosystem. Connect the earbuds to your iPhone, and they will automatically pair with other devices linked to your iCloud account. You can seamlessly switch between your iPhone, Mac, Apple TV, iPad and Apple Watch.

Apart from the deep device integration, the AirPods Pro 2 earbuds in this deal deliver outstanding sound quality. Our own David Snow sang the praises of the earbuds in his AirPods Pro 2 review, saying they deliver “undeniably high” sound quality. From a pure sound quality point, Apple’s offering is as good or better than similar options in this price range. Plus, with the AirPods Pro 2, you get features like Personalized Spatial Audio and Adaptive Transparency mode to improve the experience.

Apple continues to upgrade these earbuds via firmware updates. The company even built a state-of-the-art Audio Lab in Cupertino, California, to do pioneering work in this area. For instance, the recently added suite of Hearing Health features offer advanced tools for testing and protecting the hearing of people who wear Apple’s earbuds.

If you want in on all this juicy AirPods Pro 2 action, jump on this deal before it disappears.

Save on AirPods Pro 2 with this deal

With a $249 MSRP, the second-gen AirPods Pro are expensive. But if you want the best sound quality and amazing battery life, there are hardly any other options available. The only real rival is Beats’ Powerbeats Pro 2 earbuds, which come with ear hooks that ensure they won’t fall off during strenuous activities like sports.

This new AirPods Pro 2 deal, which knocks nearly $80 off the earbuds, is music to our ears.

Buy from: Amazon

Best earbuds for Apple gear

AirPods Pro 2 wireless earbuds (USB-C)

4.5

AirPods Pro 2 are a fantastic pair of earbuds for your iPhone, delivering terrific sound quality, excellent ANC, and advanced features like Personalized Spatial Audio.

Pros:

  • Fab sound quality
  • Excellent ANC
  • Hearing Health features let them double as clinical-grade hearing aids and active hearing protection
  • USB-C wireless charging case

Cons:

  • Hard to come up with one
